remarks: A sufficient condition for a less then relationship for the ` mod ` operator.  (Contributed by Glauco Siliprandi, 11-Dec-2019.)
statement:
ltmod.a $e |- ( ph -> A e. RR ) $.
ltmod.b $e |- ( ph -> B e. RR+ ) $.
ltmod.c $e |- ( ph -> C e. ( ( A - ( A mod B ) ) [,) A ) ) $.
ltmod $p |- ( ph -> ( C mod B ) < ( A mod B ) ) $.
